Affirmations I am strong. I believe in myself. Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself. Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from. I have so much to be grateful for. Good things are always coming into my life. New opportunities await me at every turn. I have the courage to follow my heart. Things will unfold at precisely the right time. I will be present in all the moments that this day brings.
